title: #131 Alyssa Limperis
itunes:title: #131 Alyssa Limperis
itunes:subtitle: This week I’m talking to comedian Alyssa Limperis about her Dad, who died from a brain tumour in 2018. As ever we talk grief, going home + family runs.You can follow Alyssa on Twitter on @alyssalimpYou cay follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @...
description:
This week I’m talking to comedian Alyssa Limperis about her Dad, who died from a brain tumour in 2018. As ever we talk grief, going home + family runs.


You can follow Alyssa on Twitter on @alyssalimpYou cay follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast

Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble. And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
